colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES RJES 'DZIN GYI SMON TSIG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS DGE BSGOS DGE SLONG DBANG PHUN TSOGS, DBU MDZAD SMAN BLA DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG RTAG BSTAN, DGE SLONG TSE DBANG RDO RJE, DGE SLONG SBYIN PA, DGE SLONG BSTAN 'DZIN, DBU MDZAD DGE TSUL BLO BZANG YE SHES, DGE TSUL BLO GROS YANGS PA, BLO BZANG TSE BRTAN, NGAG DBANG BZOD PA RNAMS NAS BSKUL MA MDZAD PA LTAR, PAndITA SHI LAR THU'I SPRUL MING 'DZIN PA MKHAS BTZUN BLO GROS BZANG PO'I SBYAR BA'O, ,DGE'O, ,)
